issue.description: The Alias_identification_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the aliases_are_valid rule which is not in the PDM schema.
The effectivity_item = EXTENSIBLE SELECT in the Effectivity_application_mim should be GENERIC.
The certification_item = EXTENSIBLE SELECT in the Certification_mim should be GENERIC.
The project_item = EXTENSIBLE SELECT in the Project_mim should be GENERIC.

comment.description: Fixed in repository but module needs SEDS and TC.

issue.description: The project_item SELECT in the Project_mim is named "organizational_project_item" in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. The type identifier does not appears in a part 21 of 28 schema instance.

issue.description: The action_items SELECT in the Actvity_mim is named "action_item" in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. The identifier does not appear in a part 21 or 28 schema instance

issue.description: The PDM schema contains the entity "vector" (referenced by geometric_representation_item). None of the MIMs import this entity (or the geometry_schema in its entirety).

comment.description: This is not a problem. This entity is brought in during Long Form generation.

issue.description: The Alias_identification_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the aliases_assignment_is_valid function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Event_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the event_occurrence_relationship entity (date_time_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. Including this entity is not a burden to APs wishing to use the PDM module to assure coverage of PDM schema.
event_occurrence_relationship is not in AP214 This is a problem.

issue.description: The Identification_assignment_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the version_assignment_is_valid rule which is not in the PDM schema.
The Identification_assignment_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the version_assignments_are_valid function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Person_organization_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the person_and_organization_address entity which is not in the PDM schema.
The Product_view_definition_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the initial_context_is_additional function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Product_view_definition_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the valid_context_partitions rule which is not in the PDM schema.
The Time_interval_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the time_interval_relationship entity (date_time_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: time_interval_relationship is not in AP214. This is a problem.

issue.description: The Value_with_unit_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the type_check_function function (measure_schema / support_resource_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. Function is not used and hence does not constrain the schema instance population.

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the qualified_representation_item entity (qualified_measure_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the precision_qualifier entity (qualified_measure_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the type_qualifier entity (qualified_measure_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the compound_representation_item entity (representation_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the type_check_function function (support_resource_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. Function not used in this module. It does not limit schema instance population.

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the double_toleranced_measure_item entity which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Accept. Entity will be removed from Extended_measure_representation_mim as part of GDT harmonization. Will require a SEDS and TC.

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_range entity which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the subtype_exclusiveness_representation_item rule which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. Rule is consistent with PDM schema usage guide.

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the subtype_exclusiveness_compound_representation_item RULE which is not in the PDM schema.

comment.description: This is not a problem. Extraneous subtypes are pruned during Long Form generatiion.

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_range_wr1 function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_range_wr2 function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_range_wr3 function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_range_wr3 function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Single_part_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the categories_of_product function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Product_structure_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the assembly_shape_is_defined function which is not in the PDM schema.
The Product_structure_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the coordinated_assembly_and_shape rule which is not in the PDM schema.
The PDM schema contains the entity "application_context_relationship" (application_context_schema). None of the MIMs import this entity (or the application_context_schema in its entirety).
The PDM schema contains the entity "application_protocol_definition" (application_context_schema). None of the MIMs import this entity (or the application_context_schema in its entirety).

comment.description: Accept. Propose that 1231 make an explicit interface to application_context_relationship and application_protocol_definition The 203e2 team expects wg3 to rule that these must be in any Implematation Module long form.

issue.description: The PDM schema contains the entity "founded_item" (referenced by founded_item_select). None of the MIMs import this entity (although the Catalog data information and shape representation mim contains rules that refer to it) and it is not brought in automatically during Long Form generation.

comment.description: 1231 needs to USE FROM Elemental_geometric_representation_mim and _arm. This will bring in geometric_representation_item which will bring in founded_item.

issue.description: The PDM schema contains the entity "product_definition_formation_with_specified_source" (product_definition_schema). None of the MIMs import this entity.

comment.description: (From Max Ungerer) product_definition_formation_with_specified_source is in AP203ed1. Therefore it has been included in the PDM Schema. I see no need for it in the PDM module.

issue.description: The applied_classification_assignment is declared in the Classification MIM and again in the classification_schema. This causes problems during Long Form generation.

comment.description: Accept. Will review with convener. Actually is in the Classification_assignment_mim. T

issue.description: The versioned_action_request_requires_status RULE is in the PDM schema but is declared in the Ap203e2_config_control_3d_design_module_mim. This MIM cannot be included in the PDM MIM module and is not included in the repository index.

comment.description: The module Ap203e2_config_control_3d_design_module should be ignored.

issue.description: The product_requires_version RULE is in the PDM schema but is declared in the config_control_3d_design_cc# modules. These MIMs cannot be included in the PDM MIM module and are not included in the repository index.

comment.description: Reject. The referenced module is defunct. Rules will be the problem of the AP.

issue.description: The celsius_temperature_measure_with_unit ENTITY is not in the PDM schema but appears in the generated Long Form. This ENTITY ought to have been automatically pruned during LF generation as the only reference to it is from the SUBTYPES declaration of the measure_with_unit ENTITY.
The compatible_dimension RULE (geometry_schema) is not in the PDM schema but appears in the generated Long Form.
The Document_definition_mim is required for the PDM MIM, but it contains the restrict_document_definition_category RULE which is not in the PDM schema.
The Part_view_definition_mim is required for the PDM MIM, but it contains the restrict_part_definition_category RULE which is not in the PDM schema.

The validate_dependently_instantiable_entity_data_types RULE is not in the PDM schema but appears in the generated Long Form. This RULE is declared in a number of Long Forms, but not in any resource schemas or MIM Short Forms.

comment.description: This is put in by SHTOLO tools apparently per agreement.

issue.description: The Alias_identification_mim is required for the PDM MIM, but it contains the alias_assignment_is_valid FUNCTION which is not in the PDM schema.

The dependently_instantiated FUNCTION is not in the PDM schema but appears in the generated Long Form. This RULE is declared in a number of Long Forms, but not in any resource schemas or MIM Short Forms.

comment.description: Reject. Added by SHTOLO algorithm. See 10303-11:2003 G.4.3

issue.description: The complete_membership_select = EXTENSIBLE SELECT in the classification_schema should be GENERIC.
The classification_select = EXTENSIBLE SELECT in the classification_schema should be GENERIC.

The document_reference_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the product ENTITY. The document_reference_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

The document_reference_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the product_definition_formation ENTITY. The document_reference_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the applied_security_classification_assignment ENTITY. The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

issue.description: The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the document_file ENTITY. The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

comment.description: Assignment not made in AP214, so this a problem

issue.description: The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the event_occurrence ENTITY. The date_and_time_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

issue.description: The date_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the document_file ENTITY. The date_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.
The date_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the event_occurrence ENTITY. The date_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.
The date_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the product_definition_relationship ENTITY. The date_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

The PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the dependently_instantiated FUNCTION (this and the validate_dependently_instantiable_entity_data_types RULE are generated automatically by the longform-generator in accordance with the incorrect Part 11 specification) but this FUNCTION contains invalid EXPRESS (e.g. the use of GENERIC in EXPRESS 1 code).

comment.description: Reject. GENERIC is permitted in Express 1.

issue.description: The identification_item SELECT in the Identification_assignment_mim should be GENERIC.

The identification_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains the shape_representation ENTITY. The identification_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.
The organization_item SELECT in the Person_organization_assignment_mim should be GENERIC.

The organization_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains an applied_security_classification_assignment ENTITY. The organization_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.

comment.description: Assignment not made in AP214, so this a problem

issue.description: The project_item SELECT in the Project_mim is named "organizational_project_item" in the original PDM schema.

comment.description: Reject. The identifier project_item does not appear in part 21 or 28 schema instance.

issue.description: The person_and_organization_item SELECT in the Person_organization_assignment_mim should be GENERIC.
The role_select SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains a name_assignment ENTITY. The organization_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.
The security_classification_item SELECT in the Security_classification_item_mim should be GENERIC.
The security_classification_item SELECT type in the PDM MIM generated Long Form contains a product ENTITY. The organization_item SELECT type in the original PDM schema does not contain this ENTITY.
The PDM MIM generated Long Form contains a supported_item SELECT type that is not referenced by any other datatype in the original PDM schema. This SELECT type has not been replicated in the PDM MIM.

comment.description:
The inclusion of [supported_item]this type is correct from an EXPRESS point of view, even if there is no reference to it. Clause 11.4.2 of ISO 10303-11 states: ""When a defined data type is interfaced, the following are implicitly interfaced - any defined data types represented by a SELECT data type whose selection list contains the interfaced defined data type."" The PDM Schema explicitely interfaces the defined types label, text and ientifier: USE FROM support_resource_schema -- ISO 10303-41 (identifier, label, text);
Therefore all the SELECT types containing identifier, label, or text are implicitely interfaced."

issue.description: The PDM MIM generated Long Form contains a trimming_select SELECT type that is not referenced by any other datatype in the original PDM schema. This SELECT type has not been replicated in the PDM MIM.

comment.description: (from Max Ungerer)The inclusion of [trimming_select] is correct from an EXPRESS point of view, even if there is no reference to it.Clause 11.4.2 of ISO 10303-11 states: ""When a defined data type is interfaced, the following are implicitly interfaced - any defined data types represented by a SELECT data type whose selection list contains the interfaced defined data type."" The PDM Schema explicitely interfaces the defined types label, text and ientifier: USE FROM support_resource_schema -- ISO 10303-41 (identifier, label, text); Therefore all the SELECT types containing identifier, label, or text are implicitely interfaced."

issue.description: The Extended_measure_representation_mim is required for the PDM mim, but it contains the value_qualifier SELECT (qualified_measure_schema) which is not in the PDM schema.
The external_class_name_item SELECT in the External_class_mim should be GENERIC.
RULE product_requires_category is in PDM Schema, but is in 403.

10303-1230 does not refeference the follwoing modules : - Alias_identification - External_model - Time_interval -Time_interval_assignment Does that mean that the concepts defined in these modules are not part of Part 1230. If this is the case, the module is not in compliance with the PDM Schema PRoposed change: Ensure that 10303-1230 is consistent with the PDM Schema.

comment.description: Time_interval_assignment is not in 1231 because it is not in pdm schema. Others are referenced indirectly. Propose to add Time_interval_assignment to 1231 and remove redundant express interfaces from 1230
